message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think it would really benefit you and I'm willing to part with it for $9,500.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we meet halfway between our offers at $9,000?
I'm getting close to your price, but I'm still a bit short. How about we try $8,800?
